name: Wellma
description:
The Wellmaling has one desire;
to keep Wellma, The Earth Mother,
filled up with her every desire.

It is in their peaceful glade
where Wellma wakes
and you, Wellmaling,
you must spring into action!
Because it is harvest season,
and the earth must eat.

Wellmalings be warned; Wellma has particular tastes, and a fast appetite, so keep up the pace, or she'll go hungry, and then the glade will go hungry, and then the forest, and then the earth!!! ... AND THEN THE UNIVERSE (not really)

Welcome to Wellma: A Fruit-loving Survival-o-Gardening game!

Controls

  • Move with WASD or arrow keys.
  • Keep X/SPACE pressed to grab.
  • Press X/SPACE to toss.

A Game by the Plastic Tree team!

Code Wizard: Joël @ZappedCow

Art Magician: Indiana-Jonas www.indiana-jonas.com

Music & SFX Warlock: Paws Menu @thesaveroom

Wellma (The Soundtrack) available for free at:
https://paws.bandcamp.com/album/wellma
